mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM shop_info AS A JOIN shop_convenience_info AS B on A.shopid = B.shopid WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY B.shopstatus DESC, B.grade;
SELECT A.* FROM shop_info AS A JOIN shop_convenience_info AS B on A.shopid = B.shopid WHERE brand LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{brand}, '%' ) ORDER BY B.shopstatus DESC, B.grade;
